page.title: 03ECOLOGY. HEDGEGROW FLORA
page.content: Willey has undisturbed natural flora great variety and abundance which is nowhere more clearly shown than along the well kept hedgegrows which are layed regularly. Spring brings snowdrops, primroses, wild daffodils, bluebells, violets, wood sorrel,& wood anemone which are followed by celandines, stitchwort, chickweed, campion, ground ivy,dandelions, archangel, red & white dead nettle, vetches and bugle together with ever present stinging nettles, docks and plantain.Inparts cow parsley, hogweed, ground elder, garlic mustard & dog mercury hold sway but forgetmenots, and speedwell make colourful splashes while herbrobert is plentiful. Summer brings foxgloves,rosebay willowherb, honeysuckle, roses & wild strawberries.
